decisions.description: Checking to see who booked the meeting. You'll want to update this to include how meetings come into Salesforce. Are they coming from a 3rd party application connected with fields you'd want to pull from to attribute to that solutions or other users. If you're not you can delete this decision and use the Default path.

Flow.description: This template is designed to start you off when leveraging the People Meeting model with scaleMatters to automatically update a Lead or Contact to Lead 3 based on Event Name or check if an existing meeting date has changed to update the Lead or Contact.
